item.title: How to install NVIDIA driver and CUDA on Ubuntu 23.10
item.description: In this blog post, I’ll guide you through the process of installing proper NVIDIA drivers and CUDA on Ubuntu 23.10. Scenario Let’s first understand the situation you might be facing: You own an NVIDIA GPU and need to install CUDA. You’re facing issues with missing NVIDIA drivers. The additional driver option in Ubuntu is displaying errors like pc-client-error-quark. Figure: The Additional Drivers interface may display errors for all available NVIDIA drivers (both proprietary and open).
